item.title: Samahria add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Samahria add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description:
"On some positions, cowardice asks the question, is it expedient? And then expedience comes along and asks the question, is it politic? Vanity asks the question, is it popular? Conscience asks the question, is it right?
There comes a time when one must take the position that is neither safe nor politic nor popular, but he must do it because conscience tells him it is right." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Samahria add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Samahria add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
